textos_fuente.text: About ‚Äî MANOR TAVERN Menus About Catering and Events Reservations Gift Cards Contact Back Lunch Dinner Dessert Brunch Bar Menu Wine Bottle List Wine by the Glass Specialty Cocktails WEEKLY SPECIALS Back Manor Events & Wine Suppers Catering at Manor Tavern Catering Off Premise Menus Lunch Dinner Dessert Brunch Bar Menu Wine Bottle List Wine by the Glass Specialty Cocktails WEEKLY SPECIALS About Catering and Events Manor Events & Wine Suppers Catering at Manor Tavern Catering Off Premise Reservations Gift Cards Contact THE HISTORY Come Out to the Country, We‚Äôre Worth the Drive The Manor Tavern is a picturesque, 267 year old property dating back to the time of George Washington and is said to have housed the first president‚Äôs horse on occasion. In fact, the area began as a stable and over the years had evolved into a blacksmith shop, a general store and a saloon. Our logo, inclusive of a horse, is a hat tip to our historic roots here in Monkton. Today, it‚Äôs a country oasis in the heart of steeplechase land where friends and family gather for delectable food and exquisite service. Like our history here in Maryland, our patrons are loyal and longstanding. We value the relationships we have cultivated with all of you year after year. FARM-TO-TABLE At the Manor Tavern, taste is everything. Our grounds allow us to control all aspects of the growing process from our farm to your table. We are always open to suggestions so share with us any specific herbs or produce you‚Äôd like to see in our garden. Optimal Freshness Our produce is generally harvested when we need it. When a fruit or vegetable is given the time to completely ripen, it fully develops and retains its vitamins and minerals, giving it a more vibrant flavor and maximizing the nutritional content. Our large variety of items have a longer time to ripen ‚Äúon the vine‚Äù ultimately eliminating travel time and processing and optimizing the taste and texture of our food. Community Each item that we grow has its own unique story. Growing and buying locally means you are supporting the family farmers and ranchers that raised your food. Connecting to the sources is a very meaningful part of the overall experience. Our selection of available produce changes weekly, dependent upon what is readily available in our area. This allows us to deliver items when they are at their peak, are most abundant, and in the case of farmers markets, least expensive. Managing Partner, The Manor Group Jerry Edwards, CPCE Founder of Chef‚Äôs Expressions at the Manor, NACE Hall of Fame Inductee, Hospitality Industry Icon Award Winner From 1981 to 2020, Jerry was Founder and Owner of Chef‚Äôs Expressions Catering and Events, which has twice been named The National Catering Company of the Year. Jerry holds an honorary doctorate in hospitality.¬†In 2008, he was inducted into the NACE Hall of Fame. In 2015, Jerry was honored as a National Industry Icon by the hospitality community. He has won over 50 industry competitions including Baltimore‚Äôs Best Crab Soup, three ACF Gold Medals, the ‚ÄúBest Chef‚Äù for the Meals on Wheels Culinary Extravaganza, The Crystal Toque Award in the Nation‚Äôs Capitol, The Special Event Award for best event, Baltimore‚Äôs ‚ÄúIron Chef‚Äù competition and the Mid-Atlantic Taste of Elegance competition. Today, Jerry leads the team of professionals at The Manor Tavern.¬† These outstanding individuals include Alicia Strawderman, Director of Chef‚Äôs Expressions at The Manor, Luis Banegas, Manor Tavern Restaurant Manager, Zoltan Dober-Huang and Executive Chef Sebastien Lemarre. Our team is here to serve you and create an unparalleled experience. Restaurant Manager, The Manor Tavern Luis Banegas Luis began his career with Chef‚Äôs Expressions in 1997. His infectious smile and dedication to serving guests quickly propelled him to become the top catering manager. He later managed the Chef‚Äôs Expressions operations team for over 10 years, honing his skills in leadership and customer service. With extensive experience in fine dining and exceptional hospitality, Luis is now the perfect choice to manage The Manor Tavern. This storied restaurant has undergone a renaissance under a new management team, bringing fresh enthusiasm and innovative ideas to the Tavern. Be sure to stop in and see Luis or Assistant Manager/ Sommelier Zoltan Dober -Huang, soon. Their warm welcome and exceptional service are sure to enhance your dining experience. Executive Chef, The Manor Tavern Restaurant Sebastien Lemarre Chef Sebastien brings a wealth of culinary expertise and leadership to The Manor Tavern, elevating its dining and catering experiences. With a distinguished career as both a Chef and Culinary Instructor, Sebastien has seamlessly integrated into The Manor Tavern team, sharing his knowledge in culinary arts and management. Under his leadership, he has built a talented team of chefs and cooks dedicated to delivering some of the finest restaurant and catering cuisine in the region. His impressive r√©sum√© includes serving as Executive Chef at Hunt Valley Country Club and contributing to World Central Kitchen as Director of Relief Training and Director of Culinary Training. His passion for culinary education has also been a significant asset to The Manor Tavern. He previously held roles as Culinary Arts Instructor and Coordinator in Mayag√ºez, as well as Culinary Arts Academy Director at Escuela Hotelera de San Juan. Sebastien‚Äôs dedication to culinary excellence and mentorship continues to shape and strengthen The Manor Tavern‚Äôs culinary offerings. Assistant Manager, The Manor Tavern Zoltan Dober - Huang Zolt√°n was born in Budapest, Hungary, and raised in San Jose, California. A recent Maryland transplant, he‚Äôs eager to explore everything the Chesapeake Bay State has to offer. With extensive experience in every Front of House role, Zolt√°n brings a deep understanding of hospitality to his managerial responsibilities. Having lived in California‚Äôs renowned wine regions, he developed a passion for winemaking and tasting, which he now shares as the leader of The Manor Tavern‚Äôs wine education program. He also curates weekly wine initiatives, including complimentary tastings and wine-by-the-glass specials, to enhance the guest experience. Zolt√°n‚Äôs ultimate dream is to own a chic cocktail and wine club featuring live jazz every night. In the meantime, he‚Äôs dedicated to bringing that same energy and creativity to The Manor Tavern. 410.771.8155 info@manortavern.com Hours VISIT US HOURS 15819 Old York Rd. Monkton, MD, 21111 410.771.8155 Inquiries RESTAURANT HOURS Lunch - 11:00-4:00 Wednesday to Saturday Dinner - Tuesday to Saturday 4:00-9:00 (last seating) Sunday Brunch - 11:00-3:00 Sunday Dinner - 3:00 - 8:00 BAR HOURS Tuesday open 4:00 until 9:00 Wednesday, Thursday open until 10:00 Friday and Saturday open until 11:00 Sunday open until 9:00

City Tavern ‚Äì A happy hour and nightlife hot spot for over 20 years. Located in the heart of the Downtown Fort Myers River District. | HOT DOGS FOR AUTISM!  | | HOME | | ABOUT | | MENU | | DRINKS | | CONTACT | | SPECIALS | Welcome to City Tavern! Located in the beautiful Downtown Ft. Myers River District, City Tavern has been a local happy hour and nightlife hot spot for over 25 years! City Tavern is your friendly neighborhood bar where locals and tourists alike gather for drinks, food, music, and great times! Friday and Saturday nights come alive with standing-room only, high-energy vibes! Come join the party! Enjoy daily drink specials, creative cocktails, ice-cold beer, a bite to eat from our Chef Brian Duffy inspired food menu, dancing, darts, and socializing with great friends. The friendliest staff at the best bar in town will make you feel welcome every time! Downtown Ft. Myers offers many great attractions for your River District experience. We welcome everyone to come down and see how Downtown Ft. Myers has reshaped and revitalized our community. Stop by City Tavern while you‚Äôre here and see why everyone is saying, ‚ÄúSee ya at City!‚Äù Friends City Tavern is your friendly neighborhood bar where everybody knows your name. The friendliest staff in town will make you feel welcome any night. If you‚Äôre new in town, come to City and between the staff and regulars, you‚Äôll have friends before you pay your tab! Food & Drink City Tavern teamed up with celebrity Chef Brian Duffy, to bring some of the newest, freshest ideas in gastropub fare to hit Southwest Florida‚Ä¶ The City has daily specials that are updated regularly. For something extra our awesome bartenders can get creative with something cold and refreshing that will have you coming back for more. We have a rotation of daily specials which you will love. The friendliest bar in Fort Myers Since 1998 Hours: 11AM - 2AM Everyday 21 and over after 9pm Address: 2206 Bay Street Fort Myers, FL 33901 Call / Email: 239.226.1133 info@mycitytavern.com mycitytavern Tequila and Good Vibes!!! Classic ‚Äì City Tavern Classic Hot Dogs for Autism!  | City Tavern https://mycitytavern.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/CityTavernhotdogs2024convert.mp4 PLEDGE NOW! Hot Dogs For Autism! July 4th 2025 6th Annual Chili Dog Eating Contest Benefiting a great local organization ‚Äì Family Initiative This Independence Day, City Tavern in the heart of the Downtown Fort Myers River District is proud to host our 6th Annual July 4th Block Party & Chili Dog Eating Competition ‚Äî a fun-filled celebration for a great cause! Event proceeds will benefit Family Initiative, a local nonprofit dedicated to supporting youth with autism and their families. Their mission is to build inclusive, community-focused programs that empower children through social skills groups, clinical services, and family-centered activities. Family Initiative is committed to fostering meaningful relationships, promoting emotional well-being, and helping families navigate the unique challenges of autism. Pledge now to support our local autism community and who you think will win this fun-packed competition! Fun for the whole family Block Party Event 4pm-10pm Music by DJ Juan Gomez & DJ Mickey McFly FREE Admission Chili Dog Eating Contest 6pm Fireworks 9pm PLEDGE HERE! WITH SPECIAL THANKS TO: by admin SPECIALS | City Tavern Daily Specials Daily Specials *Specials subject to change *Specials not included during holidays and/or special events Happy Hour Monday - Friday 4pm-7pm: $6 NUTRL Seltzers $7 Surfsides $5 Well Drinks $8 House Wines $9 Prosecco Splits $5 Injector Shots $5 Fireball Shots $5 Domestic Bottles All Day, Everyday $7 Deep Eddy Vodka ‚Äì Orange, Lemon, Sweet Tea, Ruby Red (Grapefruit) $7 Three Olives Vodka ‚Äì Vanilla, Blueberry, Raspberry, Cherry $9 1800 Blanco $12 Crown Royal by admin CONTACT | City Tavern Contact us Contact us Address: City Tavern 2206 Bay Street Fort Myers, FL 33901 Give us a call 239.226.1133 Send us an email: info@mycitytavern.com Name* Email* Subject Your Message by admin ABOUT | City Tavern About City About City LOCALLY OWNED & OPERATED! A BIT ABOUT US: City Tavern is a locally owned happy hour & nightlife hot spot that is sure to please! With a relaxed, comfortable atmosphere, friendliest staff, and daily specials, there is something for everyone at City Tavern. City Tavern has received awards for ‚ÄúFriendliest Staff‚Äù, ‚ÄúBest Happy Hour‚Äù and ‚ÄúBest Girls Night Out.‚Äù A BRIEF HISTORY: We are in the heart of the Downtown Fort Myers River District, adjacent to the Luminary Hotel & Co. at the corner of Bay & Dean Streets. City Tavern is in The Dean Building, which has roots dated back to 1914 when John Morgan Dean built the structure around two existing 19th-century homes. The original hotel that Dean built was called The Morgan Hotel. City Tavern has been in business since 1998 and has been under the same local ownership since 2008. While working closely with the River District Alliance, neighboring businesses, and the City of Ft. Myers, City Tavern is one of many downtown destination spots in the Fort Myers River District. We welcome everyone to come enjoy a little piece of Lee County history, that is, Downtown Fort Myers! Cheers! LOCALLY OWNED & OPERATED! A BIT ABOUT US: City Tavern is a locally owned happy hour and night life hot spot that is sure to please! With a relaxed, comfortable atmosphere, friendly staff members, and daily specials, there is something for everyone at City Tavern. City Tavern has received awards for, ‚ÄúFriendliest Staff‚Äù, ‚ÄúBest Happy Hour‚Äù and ‚ÄúBest Girls Night Out.‚Äù Our completely renovated kitchen now offers a fresh new food menu daily, 11AM-10PM! City Tavern teamed up with celebrity Chef Brian Duffy to bring some of the newest, freshest ideas in gastropub fare to hit Southwest Florida. A BRIEF HISTORY: We are located in the heart of the Downtown Fort Myers River District, adjacent to the Harborside Convention Center on the Caloosahatchee River. Situated in The Dean Building, City Tavern rests on the corner of Bay & Dean Streets. The Dean Building‚Äôs roots go back to 1914 when John Morgan Dean built the structure around two existing homes built in the 1800‚Äôs. Downtown Ft. Myers has seen many changes over the years, to say the least. Downtown underwent extreme changes including a totally new streetscape, which was completed in 2009. The latest River District changes include a brand new riverfront basin located directly in front of City Tavern, which was completed in late 2012. The construction of The Luminary Hotel began in 2018 and is scheduled to be completed in the Fall of 2020 City Tavern has been under the same local ownership since August, 2008. While working closely with the River District Alliance, neighboring businesses, and City of Ft. Myers officials, City Tavern is one of many Downtown destination spots in the Fort Myers River District. We welcome everyone to come enjoy a little piece of Lee County history that is, Downtown Ft. Visit Journal Give Holiday Ornament Calendar Gala Contact Home About Mission and History Leadership and Team Members Annual Reports, Privacy, Security and Nondiscrimination Policies. Visit Journal Give Holiday Ornament Calendar Gala Contact Gala Events Donate Facebook Instagram Linkedin Shopping-cart The City Tavern Preservation Foundation‚Äã The City Tavern Preservation Foundation is an independent 501(c )(3) organization formed to operate exclusively for charitable and educational purposes to preserve and memorialize the history and architecture with particular reference to the City Tavern in Georgetown. The City Tavern is the last remaining Federal era tavern in the District of Columbia still in operation. Subscribe to our mailing list to stay up to date with all our latest news and information! Name Email Subscribe  here Visit Us Step into the pages of history with ease at City Tavern. Secure your spot on our monthly tours via Eventbrite , uniting with fellow history buffs to unravel the tales within these hallowed walls. For a tailored experience, groups looking for private tours can reach out to us at info@CityTavernDC.org Register for Events 2024: A Year In Review Read More ¬ª January 2, 2025 No Comments November Update: A Visit to City Tavern with Jamie Peva Read More ¬ª December 9, 2024 No Comments Press Release August 27, 2024 Read More ¬ª August 27, 2024 No Comments Search Facebook Instagram Linkedin About Visit Journal Calendar Give Contact GALA DONATE Celebrate the Season Celebrate the spirit of historic preservation with our exclusive holiday ornament from City Tavern Preservation Foundation! City Tavern - Downtown Dallas, Dallas, TX √ó Did you know we do catering? Whatever your occasion, however big or small, we have the perfect options to choose from. Cater your birthday party, holiday party, corporate events, wedding festivities and more! Catering Packages √ó Let us host your special event! Whether a birthday party, office function or any other special occasion - we take care of all the fine details, bringing your event to life, just as you imagined. Host your next party or get together Book your party Skip to Main Content (972)-629-9300 info@citytaverndowntown.com 1514 Elm Street                                                          , Dallas MENU DRINKS SPECIALS CATERING PARTIES GIFT CARDS Twitter page Facebook page Instagram page Yelp page Toggle navigation Twitter page Facebook page Instagram page Yelp page MENU DRINKS SPECIALS CATERING PARTIES GIFT CARDS the video sound on or off map marker pin 1514 Elm Street, Dallas, TX 75201 About us GOOD TIMES, GREAT EATS, BETTER DRINKS! City Tavern has an impeccable reputation as a service-first restaurant and bar in Dallas, Texas. We have remained the favorite for locals and guests since 2003 and have more than 18 years of experience in the restaurant business. One of the oldest taverns in Downtown Dallas, you can eat, drink, and enjoy ‚Äòtil your heart‚Äôs content! Our Menu NOT YOUR AVERAGE TAVERN A staple for the locals of Dallas, we‚Äôre a restaurant, bar, and tavern where we serve the finest and the freshest drinks, brunch, lunch, and dinner. We‚Äôre open to dining and takeout or sit and enjoy our amazing outdoor patio! With us, you‚Äôll crave our great food, mesmerizing drinks, and exceptional hospitality, over and over again! Drinks menu A PLACE TO RELAX AND UNWIND We can proudly say that we are one of the oldest staples in Downtown Dallas. We started this place to create an atmosphere where locals and visitors would love to laugh, relax, have fun, create memories, and bond with their friends and family. Parties Book your next party with us! Need the space for your event? Search no more we have a perfect place for you! Book a Party Catering Let us cater your next event City Tavern would be honored to provide our services for your next event. Each event is bespoke to your tastes and needs, to provide the best experience possible for you and your guests. Catering order now GOOD TIMES, GREAT EATS, BETTER DRINKS! Reservations Dot slide navigation number 1 Dot slide navigation number 2 Dot slide navigation number 3 Dot slide navigation number 4 slideshow start stop playing Specials Daily Lunch Special - Taco Tuesday! Barbacoa, Chicken, or Beef l  Grilled onions, cilantro, corn tortillas l  Served with rice and beans  $10.00 11:00 AM - 03:00 PM ALL SPECIALS Reviews review by - Yelp Eric C: Our family had a staycation in downtown Dallas and decided to go to dinner with the kids at City Tavern. It is a tavern but from the moment we walked in, the staff and owners made us feel very welcomed. The owners son had a birthday that day and gave us some extra cake and it was the best birthday cake we ever had. Atmosphere and people make the experience of places and this was one of the highlights of our weekend. Highly recommend your family stops by! review by - Yelp Taneesha H: I stumbled across this bar and since they're open late I decided to give them a try. The service was A1, the food was great and came out fast and the ladies restroom was exceptionally clean which is a plus. I ordered the cheese fries and wings which I would get again. I didn't get a drink here but there were a few regulars at the bar drinking so I'm sure the drinks are good review by - Yelp Abby B: Just went for drinks on a Saturday night. Very laid back vibe, with incredibly friendly wait staff that was attentive and fast. Glasses were kept filled. The prices are very reasonable, and cheaper than what I see in most parts of Dallas, which was amazing. Great place for a chill night of drinks. review by - Yelp Matt W: This location is such a hidden gem downtown! My friends and I were walking downtown looking for something "new" to try out and decided to go into this dark tavern. The environment was pretty neat. When you walk in, it is an area that looks like an old country bar. Then there are pictures of what the bar used to look like. There's vintage stools and benches to sit on. Although it's a small area, it is sure not a place to skip out on. Johnny Cash on the wall, and sports playing on the TV... review by - Yelp Lauren R: I have been coming to this bar for over 4 years, ever since I moved downtown. I met my husband here. I met some of my closest friends here. This place has a special place in my heart. Every time my husband and I travel, we go home to drop off our bags (We don't set a single step inside) and walk straight to Tavern. Its good drinks, good food, and the best family that make City Tavern a home away from home. About TRG At the heart of any successful restaurant, is a team of passionate people. Nick Sanders founded Tavern Restaurant Group with deSha‚Äôs Maysville, KY in 1981,¬† followed by deSha‚Äôs American Tavern Cincinnati in 1990. After several trips to the UK, Nick decided to model his next concepts off of the warmth and hospitality he found in public houses throughout Europe.¬† This led to the opening of Nicholson‚Äôs in 1997 and The Pub Rookwood in 2001. The Tavern Group currently operates all of its original concepts, plus The Backstage Event Center, and an additional seven Pubs in Ohio, Kentucky, Tennessee, and Florida. Award-Winning Concepts Voted Best Fish and Chips in the U.S. Founder and CEO of Tavern Restaurant Group, Nick Sander s, has been building innovative and authentic bars and restaurants for over 45 years, including: deSha‚Äôs, Nicholson‚Äôs, The Pub, Horse and Barrel, and The Backstage Event Center. Nick was inspired to design these concepts out of the culture and hospitality he discovered during his travels throughout the United Kingdom. He is a native of Lexington, KY, a UK alum, and longtime resident of Cincinnati, OH. Nick Sanders Owner & Founder Meet Me at deSha‚Äôs deSha‚Äôs Maysville is a family restaurant named for Nick‚Äôs father, deSha Sanders. It has been a community favorite since opening in 1981, offering unique dining experience with steaks, seafood, pasta, and regional favorites not found anywhere else. In the summer of 1990, following the success of deSha‚Äôs Maysville, Nick opened the doors to deSha‚Äôs Cincinnati. Since then, they‚Äôve been on a mission to be a comfortable, down-home place to get authentic food and drink. A lot has changed over the years, but the most important things have stayed the same for both deSha‚Äôs restaurants: an unwavering dedication to warm hospitality, top-notch tavern fare, and carefully selected beer, wine, and spirits. deSha's Maysville deSha's Cincinnati A Brit About The Pub The Pub offers a unique British Pub experience complete with brilliant food, drink, and genuine hospitality. We are best known for our signature Fish-n-Chips which were voted The Best Fish and Chips in the U.S. by Greene King Brewing, the U.K.‚Äôs largest brewer and pub retailer. Our menu features an array of shareable dishes, burgers, and savory comfort food. An extensive beverage selection gives our guests the opportunity to discover fine ales and lagers from the United Kingdom, Europe, and the USA. We also feature a comprehensive collection of single malt scotch, bourbon, wine, and specialty cocktails. In true pub fashion, guests will be warmly greeted by an enthusiastic team ready to take part in their memorable experience. Experience The Pub Nicholson‚Äôs Fine Food & Whisk(e)y Located in downtown Cincinnati across from the Aronoff Center for the Arts, Nicholson‚Äôs offers a dining experience unlike any other in the city. A restaurant and bar in the heart of the theater district serving food and drink in a genuine Scottish tavern setting, taking inspiration from the public houses found throughout Great Britain and providing guests with authentic hospitality. Nicholson‚Äôs offers a wide variety of local craft beer, European ales, and spirits‚Äìalong with the largest selection of single malt scotch whiskies in the region combined with a vast bourbon collection and proprietor‚Äôs barrel program. Visit Nicholson's The Backstage Event Center The Backstage Event Center is located in downtown Cincinnati‚Äôs theater district, on the second floor above Nicholson‚Äôs Fine Food & Whisk(e)y.
